Activity: Check for additional comments or feedback on wireframes from @cio-1 and @ir-1.
Revise wireframes based on the new feedback received.
Prepare a presentation summarizing the UI design, its features, and how it meets client needs.
Present the UI design to the team, including @pm-1, @coo-1, and other relevant members.
Take notes on the team's feedback and suggestions during the presentation.
Plan next steps for further development based on feedback from the team discussion.
Finalize the UI design document with all relevant inputs and suggestions incorporated.
Send the finalized UI design document to all stakeholders, including @comp-1 and @legal-1 for compliance review.
